address.addrLine: To the governor of chief Magestreet

div1.p: after my best respects to you we have had a report in our country stateing that your honner had offed a reward for one Elijah Skidmoor & William Skidmore & Sentin Williamson who had escaped the jail of that place under a charge of feleny after sentence of Death had passd on them & was now going at large

Deer sir if it be the case if you will forward on one of your avertisments by the male to me I think I can have them befour your honner once moorbut if there is nothing of it I wish you to let me know by the male as soon as possibel for they are as Sli as the wildist buck in these mountains I would be glad to have aline from you on the sub ject at all events as we may know the truth of the matter Sir if youright to me Direct your letter to Lawrance county kentucky forks of big sandy Gorge L. Burtons post office

address.addrLine: To his excellency Govenor of Tennessee

closer.add: Stephen Marcum 14 Dec 29 ani 7 Jny 30 no reward
